<title level="1" right="Rules">[The Multiverse](/Rules.aspx?ID=2988)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
In Pathfinder, the physical universe of your world is one plane within a much broader multiverse. The Planes, on page 172, details how planes work and the multiverse of the Age of Lost Omens, but you can fit planes to your story and world, or even build a new multiverse from scratch! Perhaps there are only two planes beyond the material Universe, diametrically opposed and fighting over mortal souls, or the multiverse consists only of a series of infinite alternate realities. The options are truly endless, limited only by your imagination and the story you want to tell.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
